sections.heading: requirements; waiver; when.Upon request from a third-party administrator, the director may waive the application requirements of subsection (2) of section 44-5812 if the third-party administrator has a valid certificate of authority as a third-party administrator issued in a state which has requirem
sections.text: requirements; waiver; when.Upon request from a third-party administrator, the director may waive the application requirements of subsection (2) of section 44-5812 if the third-party administrator has a valid certificate of authority as a third-party administrator issued in a state which has requirements for third-party administrators that are at least as stringent as those contained in the Third-Party Administrator Act.SourceLaws 1992, LB 1006, ยง 88.
